articles.title: Covid-19 cases climb as South-East Asia feels force of Delta variant - The Star Online
articles.description: Having escaped the worst when the coronavirus pandemic erupted last year, South-East Asia is now suffering dramatic rises in deaths and cases, while vaccination shortfalls and highly contagious variants derail containment efforts.
